messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
We've been robbed. We've been beaten. I'm bleeding.
What's the address of your emergency?
Seven hundred.
Alright, listen to me. How many subjects were there?
One.
Were they male or female?
Male. Black male. Big.
Alright, he has her car? What kind of car is it?
It's a 2007 Honda Civic. It's blue.
Alright, listen to me. I'm going to get you an ambulance, okay? Give me one second.
Okay, I'm bleeding from my head. He beat me with a gun.
I'm going to ask you a few questions, okay? How many people are there with you?
It's me and another woman. She's my manager.
What was the black male wearing? It's very important.
He had a black long-sleeve shirt, black jogger pants. He had a kind of a ski mask that only covered his mouth. He had short hair, almost like a little tiny fro. And he was heavy-set.
What kind of gun was it? Was it a black gun, silver gun, small gun, or big gun?
Black gun. Big.
Was it a rifle or a handgun?
Handgun.
Which way did he take off in your car? Which way did he go?
He made us lay on the floor. I'm too scared to get up.
That's fine. Just take a deep breath, okay?
Okay.
And what's wrong with your manager? What are her injuries?
She was hit in the head with a gun. She's talking to me. I'm holding her hand.
Alright. Listen to me, the ambulance and the fire department are on their way. Police are in the area. I need you to stay on the line with me, okay?
Yes, please tell us when they contact us.
Chris, is law enforcement there?
Yes, they're here.
They're there. Okay, I'm going to go ahead and let you go. You need to speak with them, okay?
Okay.
The ambulance is on its way.
